Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier medical emergency at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier medical emergency at Kedzie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses will be available to provide connecting service from 35th/Archer to Midway in both directions until 6pm

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute near 61st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a parade near 61st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a parade near 61st/Eberhart.

Eastbound buses will operate via Garfield, Michigan, 63rd, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Garfield, Cottage Grove, 63rd, Indiana, then resume their normal route

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute near 61st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a parade near 61st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a parade near 61st/Eberhart.

Eastbound buses will operate via 59th, State, 63rd, Cottage Grove, the resume their normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via 61st, Cottage Grove, 63rd, Indiana, 60th, State, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
